mapper.select: SELECT gch.strCode ,gch.hospitalId ,gch.patientId ,gch.stiName ,gch.stiCode ,gch.stName ,gch.strValue ,gch.strrValue ,gch.pDoctor ,gch.stdTime ,gch.adminId ,gch.strDate ,pit.pName FROM gumcheh gch JOIN patient pit ON gch.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND gch.patientId = pit.patientId WHERE gch.hospitalId = #{session.SID}
SELECT strCode , hospitalId , patientId , stiName , stiCode , stName , strValue , strrValue , pDoctor , stdTime , adminId , strDate FROM gumcheh where patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO gumche SELECT strCode , hospitalId , patientId , stiName , stiCode , stName , strValue , strrValue , pDoctor , stdTime , adminId , strDate FROM gumcheh WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.select: SELECT gc.strCode ,gc.hospitalId ,gc.patientId ,gc.stiName ,gc.stiCode ,gc.stName ,gc.strValue ,gc.strrValue ,gc.pDoctor ,gc.stdTime ,gc.adminId ,gc.strDate ,pit.pName FROM gumche gc JOIN patient pit ON gc.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND gc.patientId = pit.patientId
